metadata.name: The space in me
metadata.description:
The space in me 
In the artistic chaos created, I look for harmony in color, form and composition. Here Each of the elements is related to each other 
In My Painting The Cosmos in Me I explore the compositional structure of the cosmos through the relationship of colors in a chosen palette..." 
 My paintings are "abstract signs" that will take you to a new, unconscious level.

60x60 cm
oil on canvas 
Physical painting included.
